input.name: infolder
input.doc: sam file in folder, Anduril output from component: index_bam

parameter.name: likelihood_fct
parameter.doc: This likelihood cluster the reads according to which transcript they map to. We coded this information in a long long unsigned int, thus you can't have more than 16 transcripts for each gene. If you really want to use gene with more than 16 transcript, you can use the likelihood function for paired-end with no information on the insert size. Just add "-e" following by a .txt file with one zero inside.

parameter.name: var
parameter.doc: But the sampling with large number of transcript is not very significant. You should try to reduce the number of transcript to ~15 or modifiy the variance of the proposal distribution with the "-s" option. The initial value is 1000, try to increase to 10'000 for large number of transcripts.
